医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Paxlovid 的延长疗程为一些长期感染新冠病毒的患者带来了希望近距离观察患者在不同时间和剂量下对该药物的反应，为最近的一项发现增添了细微差别，即 Paxlovid 不会对新冠病毒长期有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Extended-course-of-Paxlovid-shows-promise-for-some-long-Covid-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Extended-course-of-Paxlovid-shows-promise-for-some-long-Covid-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3612190-8cb6-4e21-b05b-90fffd42b14e Mon, 06 Jan 2025 07:30:00 -0500 Extended course of Paxlovid shows promise for some long Covid patients
Inogen 的 SIMEOX 200 气道清除装置获得 FDA 510(k) 许可Inogen, Inc. 是一家提供用于家庭护理环境的创新呼吸产品的医疗技术公司，今天宣布其 SIMEOX 200 气道清除装置已获得美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 510(k) 批准，扩大了该公司的业务范围在美国营销和满足慢性呼吸道疾病患者的各种需求的能力https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Inogen-receives-FDA-510(k)-clearance-for-SIMEOX-200-airway-clearance-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Inogen-receives-FDA-510(k)-clearance-for-SIMEOX-200-airway-clearance-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6a051c3-3aff-4b5a-90dd-7b81def574c7 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 06:18:00 -0500 Inogen receives FDA 510(k) clearance for SIMEOX 200 airway clearance device
ING5 调节肺癌细胞的代谢重编程肺癌因其高死亡率而臭名昭著，是全球癌症相关死亡的主要原因，而转移是导致患者预后不良的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/ING5-regulates-metabolic-reprogramming-in-lung-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/ING5-regulates-metabolic-reprogramming-in-lung-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a8a4ec8-5c20-4c39-83a2-cdc5692dc037 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 06:14:00 -0500 ING5 regulates metabolic reprogramming in lung cancer cells
研究发现布地奈德吸入剂在治疗慢性阻塞性肺病（COPD）方面没有优于氟替卡松的临床优势一项研究比较了布地奈德-格隆溴铵-福莫特罗和氟替卡松-乌美地铵-维兰特罗，揭示了对慢性阻塞性肺病恶化和肺炎风险的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Study-finds-no-clinical-advantage-of-budesonide-inhaler-over-fluticasone-in-COPD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Study-finds-no-clinical-advantage-of-budesonide-inhaler-over-fluticasone-in-COPD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f871c083-43c1-43c2-b05b-32a6b2c8a298 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 06:02:00 -0500 Study finds no clinical advantage of budesonide inhaler over fluticasone in COPD
健康保险公司限制假肢的承保范围，质疑其医疗必要性当迈克尔·亚当斯 (Michael Adams) 在研究 2023 年的健康保险选择时，他有一个非常具体的要求：假肢的承保范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Health-insurers-limit-coverage-of-prosthetic-limbs-questioning-their-medical-necessity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Health-insurers-limit-coverage-of-prosthetic-limbs-questioning-their-medical-necessity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=527b64ba-b28f-453b-98ca-08eea1282868 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 05:36:20 -0500 Health insurers limit coverage of prosthetic limbs, questioning their medical necessity
乳腺密度持续或增加与较高的癌症风险相关识别乳腺密度变化模式可以改善乳腺癌风险预测，强调筛查中纵向评估的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Persistent-or-increasing-breast- Density-linked-to-higher-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Persistent-or-increasing-breast- Density-linked-to-higher-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=100a4a06-29ec-4599-8b99-fffffe587fc9 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 05:35:00 -0500 Persistent or increasing breast density linked to higher cancer risk
局部免疫疗法可清除癌前皮肤病变并降低癌症风险卡泊三醇加 5-FU 疗法可激活免疫途径，通过针对癌前病变提供针对鳞状细胞癌的持久保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Topical-immunotherapy-clears-precancerous-skin-lesions-and-reduces-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Topical-immunotherapy-clears-precancerous-skin-lesions-and-reduces-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14e9973e-88a9-4fac-9c52-4b95cd0d2bc2 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 05:01:00 -0500 Topical immunotherapy clears precancerous skin lesions and reduces cancer risk
GLP-1受体激动剂会增加患者自杀的风险吗？一项全国性研究证实 GLP-1 RA 不会造成短期精神风险，显示与高危人群的自杀行为呈负相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Do-GLP-1-receptor-agonists-increase-the-risk-of-suicide-in-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/Do-GLP-1-receptor-agonists-increase-the-risk-of-suicide-in-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4832e7b1-544b-4e77-8555-fbbd57daa2a4 Mon, 06 Jan 2025 04:20:00 -0500 Do GLP-1 receptor agonists increase the risk of suicide in patients?
GPT-4 在分析多语言医疗记录方面表现出很高的准确性一项研究评估了 GPT-4 对英语、西班牙语和意大利语医学笔记的分析，在关键临床见解上与医生达成了 79% 的一致性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/GPT-4-demonstrates-high-accuracy-in-analyzing-multilingual-medical-notes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250106/GPT-4-demonstrates-high-accuracy-in-analyzing-multilingual-medical-notes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=474bf4e0-fa0e-4c0e-ab42-8b392fe1f00d Mon, 06 Jan 2025 03:24:00 -0500 GPT-4 demonstrates high accuracy in analyzing multilingual medical notes
H5N1 禽流感传染给马匹，引发对新病毒株的担忧研究人员报告了首例马匹 H5N1 禽流感确诊病例，强调了马匹作为病毒重组潜在宿主的作用。这项开创性的研究敦促加强监测，以预防新型流感流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250105/H5N1-bird-flu-spillover-to-horses-raises-fears-of-new-viral-strains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250105/H5N1-bird-flu-spillover-to-horses-raises-fears-of-new-viral-strains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02f61972-bcf1-493a-9c71-f2c9964b0066 Sun, 05 Jan 2025 22:10:00 -0500 H5N1 bird flu spillover to horses, raises fears of new viral strains
